directions: Place tofu, olive oil, garlic and herb seasoning, almond milk, lemon juice, garlic, and sea salt in a blender or food processor; blend until smooth. Let stand for 2 to 3 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 ⅔ tablespoons salt-free garlic and herb seasoning (such as Mrs. Dash®)
title: Tofu Salad Dressing
